title: Development and validation of a nomogram for predicting the placement of nasointestinal tubes in critically ill patients based on abdominal radiography: A single-center, retrospective study
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Zihao Zheng, Siyu Tang, Ziqiang Shao, Hanhui Cai, Jiangbo Wang, Lihai Lu, Xianghong Yang, Jingquan Liu
